properties.areaDesc: Mississippi, MO; Fulton, KY; Hickman, KY; Alexander, IL; Carlisle, KY; Ballard, KY; Pulaski, IL
properties.headline: Flood Warning issued January 1 at 8:04PM CST until January 11 at 1:30AM CST by NWS Paducah KY
properties.description:
...The flood warning continues for the following rivers in
Illinois...Kentucky...Missouri...

Ohio River at Cairo

.Recent heavy rainfall that occurred in the Ohio River basin will
continue to cause rises on the Ohio River. Minor flooding is forecast
to develop at Cairo, as it rises above flood stage Thursday evening,
with a crest forecast near 42.5 feet on Monday.

The Flood Warning continues for
the Ohio River at Cairo
* from Thursday evening to Saturday January 11.
* At  7:00 PM Wednesday the stage was 38.6 feet.
* Flood Stage is 40.0 feet.
* Minor flooding is forecast.
* Forecast...Rise above flood stage by tomorrow evening and continue
to rise to near 42.5 feet by Monday afternoon. The river will fall
below flood stage on Friday January 10th.
properties.instruction:
SAFETY MESSAGE...

Never drive cars...trucks or sport utility vehicles through flooded
areas. The water may be too deep to allow safe passage. Never allow
children to play in or near flood waters. Stay tuned to NOAA Weather
Radio or your local media for further statements and possible updated
forecasts.

Additional information is available at
http://www.crh.noaa.gov/ahps2/index.php?wfo=pah /lower case/
